info.+content: This is a story of a young man named Kariage who works as an employee in a private company named Honnyara Industries. Most of the stories in this anime tells ignorance Kariage in everyday life, sometimes even in the form of social criticism about the lives of the people in Japan .
"Yoru no Gingitsune to Tanuki" (夜の銀ギツネとタヌキ) by Ichiro & Ushio
"Kariage-kun no Kariage Gurashi" (かりあげクンのかりあげ一日) by Takashi Ike
かりあげクン Toei Animation Official Website

title.+content: tsuukai! asa no densha wa tanoshii na
ano te kono te no kasai kunren!?
kinrou kansha! otou-san no ichi nichi
fuyu wa yappari onabe da nee
onenshi shachou no goutei wa iken
jinsei raku arya ku mo aru sa
otoko no teryouri wa AIDEA ga inochi
boku wo SUKII ni tsurete tte!
shigoto wa asobi yori shinken ni!
kariage shiki fuyu no kenkou kanri
SUKEETO jou wa BOKU nchi no niwa
subette koron de OH! yuki no hi
koinu to boku no yureru BURANKO
kachou to BOKU wa nakayoshi koyoshi
jukensei no mina-sama ogenki desu ka
BOKU wa majime na otoko desu!
shitashiki naka ni mo itazura ari
miai shashin no USO to HONTO
yakyuu wa tanoshiku yara nakya ne
tou-san, kaisha ga tousan shita yo
kore ga kyuukyoku no DORAIBU da!
majime ni fu majime na hito
nippon no natsu! yukata de wa nabi e
o hiruyasumi wa minogashi chikuri yo!
shigoto SABORU no mo shigoto no uchi
natsu da! umi da! kariage da
zoku. natsu da! umi da! kariage da
shin. natsu da! umi da! kariage da
machi ni matte ta shucchou da!
natsuyasumi no shukudai owatta no kai?
WAA!! taifuu ga yatte kita ZO
tsui ni kita! geijutsu ka e no michi
kosu ni kose nai fujimi sou
kaiten shita no ga un no TSUKI!?
kariage shiki shakkin tori gekitai hou
ginkou wa riyou suru mono asobu mono
DEETO shiyou yo, hima da kara
onabe no kisetsu ga yatteki ta
iya yo iya yo mo SUKII no uchi!?
isoge! chikoku da, mou dame da !!!
fuyu ni DORAIBU, fui ni TORABURU
